# Stage 2 - Trans-Canada Highway 1 Pavement Restoration – Glacier National Park
## Official Government Tender Announcement
### Tender Reference Number
5P468-23-0018/A

### Tender Overview
The Government of Canada, through Parks Canada, is inviting contractors to submit a proposal for the Stage 2 - Trans-Canada Highway 1 Pavement Restoration project in the Glacier National Park. The project involves the replacement of the asphalt pavement in the National Park, which consists of:

* Milling and inlaying 50mm of asphalt
* Installing a 65mm asphalt overlay
* Conducting spray patching (crack repair)
* Painting lines and installing concrete barriers
* Up to 2km of ditching along the highway

This procurement is the second stage of a two-stage solicitation process. In the first stage, interested contractors were assessed for their qualifications. Only contractors who have demonstrated the necessary qualifications and experience will be invited to submit a financial bid on the project. 
### Key Project Details
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-17 16:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined
* Work shall be completed no later than August 31, 2023

### Solicitation Method
This solicitation is a competitive, selective-bidding process. Parks Canada is looking for the most suitable contractor to meet the project requirements. The tender will be evaluated on criteria such as technical ability, past experience and financial capabilities.

### Contact and Additional Information
For more information, please contact Aarondeep Maan at aarondeep.maan@pc.gc.ca or call 403-585-7139.

**Relevant NIGP Categories:**

* Highways, Roads, and Railways
* Bridges, Elevated Highways, Tunnels, Subways, and Railroads

**Relevant UNSPSC Categories:**
(None specified)

This tender is open for interested contractors to submit proposals for the described project. Proposals must demonstrate that the contractor can fulfill the necessary qualifications, experience, and expertise as outlined in the project details.
